title: STAT+: More people are surviving cancer than ever before, according to new report
description: More people are surviving cancer than ever before, as the 5-year survival rate across cancer reached 70%, according to the American Cancer Society’s new report.
content: More people are surviving cancer than ever before, as the 5-year survival rate across cancer reached 70%, according to the American Cancer Society’s new report.
